clean: find . -type d -name __pycache__ -exec rm -rf {} +; find . -name '*.pyc' -delete; rm -rf .pytest_cache .mypy_cache .coverage htmlcov/
setup: pip install -r requirements.txt && pip install -r requirements-dev.txt
validate:specs: python -c "import json; spec = json.load(open('spec.json')); print('✓ Especificação válida')"
